title: Boyfriends Always Turned out to Be a Horror Movie Boss - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Horror   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Alternate World   Amnesia   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Arrogant Characters   Bullying   Clingy Lover   Cross-dressing   Devoted Love Interests   Eidetic Memory   Episodic   Fated Lovers   Flashbacks   Ghosts   God Protagonist   Gods   Human Experimentation   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Interconnected Storylines   Interdimensional Travel   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Monsters   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Mystery Solving   Non-linear Storytelling   Obsessive Love   Past Plays a Big Role   Possessive Characters   Reincarnation   Sealed Power   Souls   Strong Love Interests   Stubborn Protagonist   Survival Game   Time Skip   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Unlimited Flow   World Hopping   Younger Love Interests

description: Zhou Yu is just an ordinary person. After his heart attack, he was born again. He thought he could enjoy life well, but he did not realize that this world was a supernatural world. He always bumps into ghosts and a group of reincarnators who would use him as an NPC. His lover always turns into a horror movie BOSS.>
